appConfigDescriptors.appConfigDescription: Freeform config for toggling experimental mode features
appConfigDescriptors.appConfigDefaultConfiguration: {\"Google Map on Teams page\": false, \"View Associated Projects\": false, \"Provenance widget for Docker images\": false, \"JSON Schema-aware annotation editor\": false, \"JSON Schema validation status\": false, \"Description field\": false, \"Ability to add certain Wiki Widgets\": false, \"Wiki diff tool\": false, \"Custom storage location settings\": false, \"Challenge submission configuration settings\": false, \"Provenance v2 visualization\": false, \"VirtualTable support\": false, \"SRC-based create/update AR modal\": false}
